reqs:
Pre-reqs: All of EOSC 323, EOSC 330 and one of EOSC 321, EOSC 322.
A 3-week field school which runs after April exams. Substantial additional fees required. Several informational meetings will be held before the end of term. Email instructor regarding registration if course is full. The purchase of some geological mapping equipment will be required for this course, see website for details.
Field School runs in May 2017.
description: Recording and processing geological data in the field. Held within the three weeks following April examinations after third year. A special fee is to be paid by January 31.
